titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (S. 1932) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 201(a) of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2006.

Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (S. 1932) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 201(a) of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2006.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 640.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-363, by Mr. Putnam.
All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read. Section 2 of House Resolution 619 is amended.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 141.

action.text: The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Waives points of order against consideration of the conference report on S. 1932 (providing for reconciliation under the concurrent resolution on the budget for FY2006).
